message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to revolutionize your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your company. Considering its worth, I propose a price of $15000 for the product. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency and growth. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product,  $15000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
